profile:
We have been one of the number 1 reviewed home inspection company for 12 years!!  

We take special Covid 19 safety precautions for everyone's safety.

All of our inspections include a 5 Year Roof Leak Warranty, 90 Day limited Warranty on: Mechanical, Structural, Mold and Sewer.  We also submit most appliances for a Recall Check.

Ask us about our Discounts!

Accurate Home Inspection is very proud to have won the Best of Calgary Home Inspection 8 Times! 2011, 12, 13, 14, 17, 18, 19 and 2020  Receiving this honour for the many years makes us want to work even harder for you and continue delivering the best home inspection service possible.

We are up to date in all aspects (certifications/memberships) to ensure that we do the inspection right the first time and every time.
Infrared Certified Building Thermographer, Red Seal Journeyman Carpenter, Professional Home Inspector (PHI), Certified Home Inspector (CHI)

Call us for a quote or fill out the inspection request on our website.   https://www.calgaryinspection.ca/inspection-request.html

Read some interesting articles on our blog:  https://www.calgaryinspection.ca/blog.html/

profile:
COVID PROTOCOLS IN PLACE - Get it inspected - safely!

When you are buying a house you are buying a job. Invest in a Diamond Home Inspection and make an informed choice when buying your new home. 
I am committed to providing the best inspection experience for my clients. I am responsible for giving you an understanding of the scope of the work that you are looking at buying. Some of that depends on how it was built, some of that depends on how well it was maintained/renovated. I perform a visual, non-invasive inspection of the condition of the home, so you can make an informed purchasing decision. Using my training, tools and experience to read the story of how the home was built and how it was maintained. Every house will have "issues", doesn't matter if it is a "new" house or a "used" house. The question then becomes - so what? Is this a major problem now? Is it something that will only get worse or is it something that is no longer changing? Is it is a big deal or red herring? Some of the answers will depend on you, your patience, ability, monetary situation and/or your plans for the home, others- like safety issues, are self explanatory.
I have a background in construction, internationally recognized training, national inspector association affiliations expert tools and a thirst for continued education.

May is Deck Safety Month. Be sure to get a deck inspection before the summer entertainment season!

Getting you shingles replaced and want to be sure it was done right? Include an inspection as part of the contract, and Call for a roof inspection before you make final payment.
Registered, Certified, Bonded, Licensed, and I love my job!

profile:
About Blueprint Home Inspection
Premier Provider of Pre-listing and Pre-purchase Inspection Services in Calgary, Airdrie, Okotoks, Chestermere, and Cochrane, AB
 
Avoid surprises in real estate. Whether you’re selling your property or buying your dream home, you’re in good hands with guidance by Blueprint Home Inspection. Based in Calgary, Alberta, our company offers independent, transparent, and all-inclusive inspections on residential properties in the city and nearby communities like Cochrane, Chestermere, Okotoks and Airdrie.

Our non-invasive pre-listing and pre-purchase inspections include the use of infrared thermal imaging, moisture meters, electrical testers, and other innovative tools that will not damage or affect any structure in any way. Apart from checking structural elements, our specialization also involves insulation, heating and cooling systems, appliances, electrical, plumbing and more. With extensive coverage, our home inspections present clients with significant details that will help them make good decision before they buy or place their property on the market for sale.

Your Local Home Inspector in Calgary, AB
Our home inspector is Brad Stinson CMI (Certified Master Inspector). The Certified Master Inspector designation is the highest designation offered by the International Association of Certified Home Inspectors. Mr. Stinson's Home Inspection career began in 1979 as a National Building Code compliance inspector. Having devoted his entire career to the inspection and analysis of residential property, Mr. Stinson's experience is second to none, and includes a unique, first-hand knowledge of construction materials and building practices spanning the past 35 years.

A Note from Brad Stinson Our Inspector…
"I know you have many home inspectors to choose from in Calgary. If you'll trust me with your home inspection, I can promise you my personal best. I know what to look for and I am prepared to express my opinion as to the severity of any issue whether serious or not. Doing my job right means you are clear on the property’s overall condition and each functional component in particular."

profile:
Wild Rose Property Inspection gives you peace of mind, whether you are buying or selling your first, second, or third home. Our experience and expertise in construction, renovation, and repair gives us the understanding of what to look for.
A home inspection isn’t just about protecting your investment, but also about protecting you and your family. The home inspectors at Wild Rose Property Inspection understand this and take their profession very seriously. They know they are an integral part in your decision to make the biggest investment of your life. Though not mandatory in every province, a residential home inspection should be a part of every real estate transaction. It is the best way to ensure that everyone is protected.
